p:
Enrichment analysis was also performed on genes that were differentially expressed in 1–2 days of treatment with chemotherapy (GSE39324)
36
vs. prior treatment using clusterprofiler
55 . The enrichGO and enrichKEGG function was applied with the Benjamin & Hochberg
56 method enforced (threshold 0.05). The output was merged with known COVID-19 pathways using R to identify overlapping upregulated and downregulated GO and KEGG pathways.
